scripts.build: rimraf build && rimraf node && mkdir node && copyfiles -u 1 "./src/**/*" ./node && webpack && rimraf build/src && rimraf node
scripts.package:lib: npm run build && copyfiles ./package.json ./checkNodeVersion.js build && cd build && npm version "5.0.0" && npm pack
scripts.publish:lib: npm run build && cd build && npm publish
scripts.lint:fix: npx prettier --loglevel silent --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --write "sasjs-tests/src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}"
scripts.lint:silent: npx prettier --loglevel silent --check "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}" && npx prettier --loglevel silent --check "sasjs-tests/src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,html,css,sass,less,json,yml,md,graphql}"
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir && git config core.hooksPath ./.git-hooks && git config core.autocrlf false || true
